text: The "Romania national futsal team" represents Romania in international futsal team. They have qualified for the UEFA Futsal Championship and they are yet to qualify for the FIFA Futsal World Cup. ==Tournament records== ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== FIFA Futsal World Cup record FIFA
